creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. C. Bovey
description: plate, ceramic, dark blue glaze, hunting scene in center medallion, with a frame of gold scrools and floral sprays; deep border of scrolls and leaves in gold borders central panel, rim pierced with sprays of forget-me-nots alternating with lattice panels bearing single forget-me-nots in blue and gold, scalloped, pierced rim with gold edge
title: Plate
